title: Weird Lag
body:
I played my first game today and everything was fine, then I went to my second game and i started to get weird input lag. Now every time I try to get into a new game I never get past the loading screen and then get a message box saying I was disconnected from league of legends.

My internet is working fine, I'm having 0 issues anywhere else.

replies.body:
Since different servers are in different geolocations, you could be having issues specifically along your route to the League servers. As a first step, though, I recommend ensuring your local network settings are compatible with those listed in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if your issue persists.
